column4: Hi, I've just grudgingly switched from Debian stable to Hardy and I'd like to configure my sources.list to feed me nothing besides security updates.  Is hardy-updates the best I can get, or is there something more stable available?
There are a bunch of commented out security.ubuntu.com entries, but if I uncomment them then apt-get update hangs.
system > administration > synaptic > settings > repositories > updates ?...
this is server edition, I don't have a GUI yet.
